特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: All lessons will be conducted completed in English. Most lessons will be based on the textbook and involve listening and speaking practice. Students will be expected to participate in class discussions in pairs and in small groups, give class presentations and work on group projects. Interaction in English with the teacher and classmates is a key part of the course. The textbook used in this course is CEFR B1 (about 500 to 700 TOEIC). Therefore, it is not recommended that you take this class if you have a high level of English. Please be aware that this will be a mixed level class, so you will be expected to speak with students who have different levels of English.
